Articles.Content: Hey guys, this is my first post. I thought that in future versions of KSP that there could be a rival space program that has a center somewhere on Kerbin (Kensington?) that you could be rewarded for sending a bomber plane and damaging/destroying their facilities. Let me know what you think.
Do they really reward NASA for bombing Baikonur? I thought they had the military for that.

Hey guys, this is my first post. I thought that in future versions of KSP that there could be a rival space program that has a center somewhere on Kerbin (Kensington?) that you could be rewarded for sending a bomber plane and damaging/destroying their facilities. Let me know what you think.

Welcome to the forum!

Here\'s some advice: Lurk more.

There is bound to be a mod for that, or will be. And that is where I would prefer it stay. We manage to cause enough destruction trying to launch our kerbals into space than to expand it further into some militaristic direction. I am going to say it now, I am getting sick of these posts saying let\'s make KSP into a bombing simulator. Let\'s don\'t and let the modders say they did. KSP is a ballistic and aerospace flight simulator. It is meant to build something.

If you really want to destroy stuff, then collaborate with someone to make a mod for it. You will get what you want and actually feel better for it than just sitting there and begging for it.

Welcome to the forum, and take my reaction here as proof that this has been discussed to death already by the community. You should have no problems finding the other posts.
